About Me

Hi! I’m Athul V Anil, a passionate Java/C++ developer and tech enthusiast. With strong expertise in Spring Boot, AWS, and cloud-based solutions, I specialize in creating scalable microservices. Iâ€™m experienced in developing robust applications, automating code generation with AI, and building intuitive user interfaces. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always excited to tackle new challenges.
